price: 77. Waxaan dhab ahaan u waxyoonnay Muuse (Annagoo ku leh): "Guureysii addoomahayga oo uga yeel waddo badda dhexdeeda qallalan, ha ka cabsan haleel14 hana ka baqin hafitaan)".
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِي فَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُمۡ طَرِيقٗا فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ يَبَسٗا لَّا تَخَٰفُ دَرَكٗا وَلَا تَخۡشَىٰ
footnotes: 14. Ku dhufashada badda usha, eeg Suuradda Ash-Shucaraa: Aayadda 63. Haleel macnaha inuu ku soo gaaro Fircoon.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī fa-iḍ'rib lahum ṭarīqan fī al-baḥri yabasan lā takhāfu darakan walā takhshā
